#!/bin/sh
mkdir -p /mnt/server

apt install -y curl tar jq git

## get release info and download links
LATEST_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/microsoft/azure-pipelines-agent/releases/latest")
RELEASES=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/microsoft/azure-pipelines-agent/releases")
MATCH=assets.json
ARCH=$([[ "$(uname -m)" == "x86_64" ]] && echo "linux-x64" || echo "linux-arm64")

if [ -z "${VERSION}" ] || [ "${VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i ${MATCH})
else
    VERSION_CHECK=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .tag_name')
    if [ "${VERSION}" == "${VERSION_CHECK}" ]; then
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -i ${MATCH})
    else
        echo -e "defaulting to latest release"
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url)
    fi
fi

cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o assets.json ${DOWNLOAD_URL}

REAL_DOWNLOAD_URL=$(cat assets.json | jq -r .[].downloadUrl | grep -i vsts-agent | grep -i ${ARCH})

cd /mnt/server
curl -o vsts-agent.tar.gz -sSL ${REAL_DOWNLOAD_URL}

tar xzf vsts-agent.tar.gz
rm vsts-agent.tar.gz

export AGENT_ALLOW_RUNASROOT="0"
./config.sh --unattended --acceptTeeEula --url ${SERVER_URL} --auth PAT --token ${PAT} --pool ${POOL_NAME} --agent ${AGENT_NAME}

echo "Installation completed"
echo "-----------------------------------------"
